title: How to write a formal document - Quora

response.answer_text: What do you mean under this title “formal document”? It depends on the topic. Maybe I do not fully understand the question, you can find a better help from WritinGeek. It could be Memo, Business Email message, Letter, Order form, Invoice, and Agenda or something else. Anyway, the main thing is that formal documents use only formal language and generally formal words.There are two types of formal documents - short formal and extended formal.
